programme.desc: Hye-jung works in a factory on the outskirts of the city. All she wants is to live alone in peace. One night, however, she finds she has become a ghost. As a ghost, she goes back in time, day by day, and tries to keep out of harm's way.

programme.title: Search And Destroy
programme.desc: American Ranger John Cutter seeks revenge against the notorious Ukrainian arms dealer responsible for his demise.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 3

programme.title: Selfie From Hell
programme.desc: After her cousin comes to visit and falls ill, a woman starts to receive strange cell phone messages.

programme.title: Money

programme.title: Default
programme.desc: A dramatization of the behind-the-scenes story of the IMF negotiations that took place during the financial crisis in 1997, through three parallel stories.

programme.title: Billionaire Boys Club

programme.title: Hitman

programme.title: The Grey

programme.title: Necromancer
programme.desc: A survivor of a black magic attack sets out to avenge the death of his love ones with the help of a powerful sorcery

programme.title: Predestination

programme.title: Game Of Death

programme.title: Williams Sisters

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the puma’s true nature.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Naledi follows the journey of a baby elephant orphaned in a rescue camp, as the man tasked with her survival races to protect an entire species while fighting to save her life.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of Owls
programme.desc: This stunning series uncovers 'The Secret Life Of Owls' as never seen before, using a special camera rig to follow families of owls in a wild corner of rural Essex, through winter, spring and summer.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Growing Up Grizzly: A Tale Of Two Orphans

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: From finding a mate in the branches, to adapting to life at height, tree dwelling animals have evolved unique traits to ensure they thrive in this hostile and complex environment.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2

programme.title: Aerial Italy

programme.title: Aerial Italy

programme.title: Aerial Italy

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Bathed in sunshine and Big Latin Culture, Mena learns to make classic Cubanos and traditional Puerto Rican mofongo—vegan-style. programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota seek the legendary British king. Clive meets a real Merlin and tries to wield Excalibur, while Mary-Ann sits at the Round Table and searches for Arthur’s final resting place to discover the truth behind the legend.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota hunt for Britain’s great warrior Queen: Boudica. Mary-Ann predicts the future with a giant rabbit, while Clive rides a war chariot and peers into some entrails to discover that overthrowing the Romans was truly revolting.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota test outrageous remedies like leeches, head-drilling, and a pigeon that cures the plague. Also, Henry VIII’s role in Tudor medicine.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota investigate one of Britain’s sinister mysteries: decapitated bodies in gruesome poses, warrior kings with tiny heads… and killer cake.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: With their enemies defeated and the volcano erupting on Dragon's Edge, the riders decide to return to Berk but Hiccup discovers that the Dragon Hunters are still out there

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When the riders receive an invitation to Berserker Island for Gustav's apprenticeship graduation, they arrive to find Savage trying to take over Dagur's throne

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island he comes face-to-face with the Wing Maidens and must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The Riders follow the aging Eruptodon to the sacred Dragon Graveyard, but soon find themselves trapped by the fearsome Sentinel dragons who guard the graveyard

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Thor Bonecrusher is needed to rescue hostages taken by the Bandits, Snoutlout tries to help but accidentally brings to life Thor's evil twin – Anti-Thor – who sides with the Bandits

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Hiccup and Astrid go away for a weekend, the Edge is attacked by Krogan, Viggo, and their new Dragon Flyers

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup and the riders are on the run from the Flyers, but when they return to Berk, where Stoick is preparing for war, Hiccup is torn between his desire to get the Edge back and his unwillingness to fire on dragons

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Stoick decides to take the battle on the Dragon Flyers to the Edge, the Riders must figure out how to trap the Flyers and take back the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After being ambushed by aggressive Slitherwing dragons on a new island, the Riders think Stormfly has been poisoned and race to get an antidote

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Tuff fakes his own death to make room for Throk, but when Ruff tries to train the Changewing that she thinks ate Tuff, a flock of angry Changewings come for the dragon

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: On a search for Dagur's dad, Hiccup and Dagur encounter vicious Grim Gnashers, and Tuff's search for a missing Chicken leads him to discover she has a second family

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After Heather is lured to the Northern Markets as a trap, Hiccup flies to find her, but when he arrives too late, Windshear is captured by Krogan

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The kids meet an unlikely ally when trying to find Po

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip doesn't think her grandparents will approve of Oh so he disguises himself as a humans housekeeper/Sharzod adopts Pig and names him “Juicy Booty.”

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Sherman's scout troop, the Laser Robot Tiger Troopers, earn their merit badges on the show; Mark Twain's gift for gab wins back his lucky typewriter.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: During an ice storm, Speed Stingers infest Berk, driving the residents into hiding.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Abra-Ca-Deedstown From cleaning Ra's sarcophagus, to starring in Jimmy's magic act, Casper has been helping so much, he's exhausted. Shrinky Dust When magical Shrinky Dust falls into Norman the bully's hands, Casper and Jimmy find themselves on a hunt to get it back.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Knights have found a mysterious Golden Thing. But the Pirates insist it's their Golden Thing. Noddy tries to settle the argument by investigating: Who is the owner of the Golden Thing? He soon finds more and more Golden Things have been hidden all over Toyland.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has post‐traumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm’s VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society’s conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Mankind has always pondered what happens after death and what we leave behind. Many wonder what power our bones may hold. Some believe bones can bring good luck or even allow us to speak with the dead.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: Hungarian professor, Erno Rubik, ignites "Cube Mania" with his 3D puzzle that takes the world by storm. Leslie Scott will stop at nothing to bring an iconic building block board game to market.

programme.title: American Godfathers: The Five Families
programme.desc: Follows the American Mafia from their early development in New York City through Prohibition to the boom days of the 1950s. It explores the families' operations and their alleged code of honour.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The gates are open to some of history's most sinister structures. From the terrifying Tower of London to a hotel of horrors, discover the dark secrets hidden within these foreboding fortresses.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: For thousands of years, Scotland has been an epicentre of otherworldly phenomena. It is home to strange ancient stone circles, stories of strange beings. Is Scotland a magnet for extraterrestrial visitors?

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: Hungarian professor, Erno Rubik, ignites "Cube Mania" with his 3D puzzle that takes the world by storm. Leslie Scott will stop at nothing to bring an iconic building block board game to market.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: One of WWII greatest unsolved mysteries: an incomparable work of art is lost without a trace. Perhaps the single most valuable object the Nazis ever stole, the quest for it has lasted over 75 years.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: For centuries, humanity has been fixated on Mars - the glowing red orb in the night sky. As a new era of exploration of the Red Planet begins, we are on the cusp of finally solving its mysteries.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Mankind has always pondered what happens after death and what we leave behind. Many wonder what power our bones may hold. Some believe bones can bring good luck or even allow us to speak with the dead.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Amidst financial troubles, Disney hires an ingenious marketing whiz who helps them figure out how to bring their beloved characters off the screen and into the hands of millions.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: In the early 1900s, a modern-day prophet from the hills of Kentucky became a worldwide sensation: Edgar Cayce. He claimed to receive visions of both the past and the future while in a trance.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: While the drilling operation gets closer and closer to its destination, the team is shocked when they discover evidence of an ancient safe.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Three of the strongest Alone participants take on a bushcraft challenge devised by one of their own - build an Earth Shelter in three days using just a few surprise tools.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Three former Alone participants take on a difficult challenge they've never tackled before - build a Bushcraft Bridge in three days using just a few simple tools.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Jake spends the night in the mountains after his snowmobile breaks down. Paul traps for mink and pine marten. Eustace helps a friend buy and assemble an antique sawmill.

programme.title: FDR (Franklin D. Roosevelt)

programme.desc: Papa Bear is back, and he's bigger than ever. He goes for a pair of mysterious blue shipping cases. Brandon and Lori find a 3 D printer, but have no idea what it does or how much it's worth until they take it to get appraised. What they find out amazes them.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 5
programme.desc: A mysterious vault has everyone wondering what could be inside. Jesse gets nostalgic over a bin that takes him back to his childhood. Brandon and Lori clean up more than they clear out. And T Money finds out the hard way that, sometimes, it's not better to be safe than sorry.

programme.title: Friends S6 14
programme.desc: Angry that Rachel interfered in her relationship with Ross, Jill sets out to seduce him.

programme.title: Friends S6 15
programme.desc: Contemplating how differently their lives could have turned out, the friends fantasize about possibilities.

programme.title: Friends S6 16
programme.desc: In the friends' continuing speculative fantasy, Ross initiates a threesome with his wife and her female friend--and gets left out.

programme.title: Friends S6 17
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica agree to give each other homemade presents for their six-month anniversary.

programme.title: Friends S6 18
programme.desc: When a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe must choose between living temporarily with Joey or Monica. Ross gets into trouble by dating a student. Chandler tries to help Joey's career.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 6
programme.desc: It's spa day for the Jokers, although for them it's anything but relaxing. Then at the park, Sal reveals his secret identity while discussing the "birds-and-bees" of dolphins. Plus, surprised strangers wish they could have their "penny" back for sharing their thoughts. Finally, the big loser finds himself a little over dressed, and at the last minute has the runway pulled out from under him.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 7
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Sal and Q network their way into some very uncomfortable business conversations, and go head to head in a photography presentation that's anything but picture perfect. Then, the clock is ticking during a time sensitive challenge in the park. And finally, tonight's big loser thinks he can sing and dance his way out of his punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 8
programme.desc: The Jokers make some tough calls at a telemarketing agency that leave everyone wondering if they're just phoning it in. Then the guys' intentions get wishy-washy at a fountain in the mall. Plus, Q and Sal tap into their spiritual side when they catchsome dreams down at the shore. And the big loser of the night has his tour dampened by the other Jokers.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr take to the court to serve up some seriously personal tennis lessons, and then head to the park for a bewildering game of Now! And tonight's loser must put his face through the ultimate test during a food presentation!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 10
programme.desc: Q, Murr, Sal, and Joe provide a false sense of security to some sassy shoppers at a drug store, and the competition reaches new heights during a rematch of their balloon challenge in the grocery store. And tonight the guys laugh and cry their way through the first ever permanent punishment!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 3
programme.desc: The big tension of the day is between T Money and Brandon. T goes for the mystery bins -- the box and the barrels. The antique gun he finds has been altered, so he needs to find out if it's worth anything.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 4
programme.desc: Papa Bear is back, and he's bigger than ever. He goes for a pair of mysterious blue shipping cases. Brandon and Lori find a 3 D printer, but have no idea what it does or how much it's worth until they take it to get appraised. What they find out amazes them.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 5
programme.desc: A mysterious vault has everyone wondering what could be inside. Jesse gets nostalgic over a bin that takes him back to his childhood. Brandon and Lori clean up more than they clear out. And T Money finds out the hard way that, sometimes, it's not better to be safe than sorry.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 6
programme.desc: A trip to Lake Arrowhead brings rain, snow and a new couple who drive Brandori crazy. What's inside T Money's mystery tent?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: The latest from ABC News on the weekend, bringing you the day's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food - Episode 5
programme.desc: Chef Khanh Ong embarks on an epic road trip through Central Gippsland, Victoria. He learns how to forage for ingredients for a wild salad, harvest mushrooms and create spice blends from native ingredients.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 17 - Essendon v Gold Coast Suns
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Landline: India - Wool: Looming Future
programme.desc: A trade deal opens up new partnerships, cotton and wool grown in Australia, made in India and exported to the world and; supplying a demand for almonds, avocadoes and wine to a new generation with a taste for new food.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 5
programme.desc: After a crash leaves Zombie injured, the crew scrambles to stay on schedule for Ridermania. Jess arrives at the festival, participate in events and is met with overwhelming support from fans and fellow riders.

programme.title: This Place - Shadows on the Hill
programme.desc: Troy Cassar-Daly sings 'Shadows on the Hill' and talks about his boyhood by the river. His nan never allowed him to swim to the other side and it wasn't until he was an adult that he learned the story of a massacre.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 17 - Geelong Cats v Richmond
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 186
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and today's top stories, with more reporters to tell you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 17 - Brisbane Lions v Port Adelaide
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Sunday Island, Atherton Tablelands, Hobart
programme.desc: Ernie traverses the blue waters and tidal passages to Sunday Island, Aaron experiences the magic and culture of the Atherton Tablelands and Rae hears the history of Hobart from a palawa perspective.

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 24
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Four Corners - Trading In Chaos
programme.desc: We examine the chaos, confusion, uncertainty and fear generated by Trump's so-called reciprocal tariffs, which experts say will increase the cost of living, make the US poorer and the world a less prosperous and secure place.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 25
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Larapinta - Episode 3
programme.desc: Talia experiences first-hand the work that is being done to protect country to create a healthier environment to allow species to flourish, and is introduced to the enigmatic mammals and water creatures found along the river.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia - 1980: Mike Walsh, Malcolm Johnston, June Bronhill
programme.desc: Take a journey back to 1980 when Michael Parkinson was joined by guests Mike Walsh, Malcolm Johnston and June Bronhill.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Sitiveni Rabuka - Prime Minister of Fiji
programme.desc: Sitiveni Rabuka, Prime Minister of Fiji, addresses the National Press Club of Australia.

programme.title: Compass - Stan Grant On Country with Indira Naidoo
programme.desc: Indira Naidoo in conversation with Stan Grant, exploring his deepening faith, Indigenous spirituality, his response to the Voice referendum, and the pivotal relationship with his father, a Wiradjuri elder.

programme.title: Good Tucker - Episode 5
programme.desc: Suren learns to make Dumplings at Lucy's, a beloved Mallacoota restaurant.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 27
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday as Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you an engaging mix of the latest news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics, global affairs, culture and weather. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 27
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 23
programme.desc: With just over two weeks until the opening of the 48th Parliament on July 22, guest host Patricia Karvelas is joined by a panel of leading political minds to discuss the past week in politics and the issues to keep an eye on.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

programme.title: Death Wish
programme.desc: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks. In self-defense, the vengeful man kills muggers on the mean streets after dark.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad & The Ugly
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible "Man With No Name" in a lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money. Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach also star in this renowned western.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon’s (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton’s pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor’s girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he’ll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account – or go back to being the world’s wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success.

programme.title: The Battle Of Britain
programme.desc: In the greatest air battle of WWII, Harry Andrews, Michael Caine and Sir Laurence Olivier take to the skies to fend off the German invasion of England.

programme.title: Children Of A Lesser God
programme.desc: Based on the hit Broadway play, it’s the uplifting love story of John Leeds, an idealistic special education teacher, and a headstrong deaf girl named Sarah. Soon their teacher/student relationship blossoms into love.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Better Off Zed
programme.desc: A lazy man in his thirties is happy to sit out the zombie apocalypse in his fortified suburban abode, until his wife acts on a more pragmatic strategy for survival, forcing him to become a zombie killer!

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: During an exchange of gifts in class, Flavie receives a disappointing present. Felix is invited to a party but fears he's only been invited because he's a celebrity.

programme.title: Ernest Et Celestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Celestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances
programme.desc: October 1939. Ernest and Colette are getting used to life Normandy. At school, they make both friends and enemies, the Morteau kids above all. It is the time of the 'phoney war', a period without fighting but rife with rumours.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald's - Le Meilleur De La Saison
programme.desc: A recap of the 2024/2025 football league championship season in France.

programme.title: Passe-Moi Les Jumelles
programme.desc: An invitation to take a break and dream. On the line-up: emotions, encounters, travelling, favourites and breathtaking landscapes...

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'azur.

programme.title: Waouh !
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: At 17, fleeing the Taliban, Rohullah Hossiny travels through Iran, Turkey, and Greece before arriving in Belgium. In Brussels, thanks to the Duo for a job association, he finds a mentor and joins Corica, where he becomes a master roaster. In turn, he trains other exiles.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: Finalist at the Los Angeles and Seoul Olympic Games, Michel Pou is now the general coach of AS Monaco swimming and the Monaco Swimming Federation. In office since 2012, the native of Nice always knew he wanted to pass on his knowledge. He reflects on his journey.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Pa T'mentir
programme.desc: Afro hair is often associated with racial prejudice, synonymous with poverty or a lack of cleanliness. Schelby, Keithy and Irdens question what hair represents in black culture, and in that of Quebec.

programme.title: Serge a Paris
programme.desc: Serge poses for the photographer to the stars, Thomas Vollaire, then goes to the Paparazzi restaurant. He talks to Anthony Kavanagh in front of the Olympia about his breakthrough in France. He then talks to pianist Helene Mercier at the Grand Amour Hotel.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel
programme.desc: Between water, sky and stars, it's time to set off on a long trek through the high Alps and a night at the Corno Gries mountain hut. From there, we head to the Cristallina hut in the unspoilt wilderness of Val Bavona.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Les Journees Particulieres by LVMH: perspectives for the craft professions in the world of fashion. The story of sauerkraut, a journey from China to Alsace. Graphic artist Sarah Naud and her sculptures in cement. How to get the biker look. Dgena Mouclier and upcycled menswear fashion.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: At the edge of the Fontainebleau Forest, we visit a museum dedicated to the Barbizon painters. Diane Benoit du Rey paints light on canvas and light fittings. Between textile craftwork, painting and sport, the brand 3. Paradis, cultural fusion. Decorative gilder, there's gold at the tip of elisabeth Bonjean's paintbrush.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: On Est Rendu La
programme.desc: The youth of today live and express their gender in a much more varied way. Thanks to Mike, Samira and Le?o, we explore the principle of fluidity which characterises the new generation.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Grand echiquier
programme.desc: Singers, musicians, dancers, choreographers and young talent all come together to share the prestigious stage of the ''Grand echiquier''; turning it into the largest concert venue in France, just for the time of the programme.

programme.title: Disparition Inquietante
programme.desc: Lino and Norma are a happy couple. But when Norma goes to the maternity hospital to give birth, she disappears. Despite all their differences Iris Koben heads the investigation with Samuel Camurat. The pressure is on: Norma's life and that of her baby are in danger.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Preserving the trace, refusing to allow memories to disappear... Valerie Jolly moulds objects that bear witness to times past, stone, pipes, things abandoned... from figurative to abstract, expanding the field of possibility...

programme.title: Basique, Le Concert
programme.desc: Meeting with a singer or a band and retransmission of one of their concerts.

programme.title: Heaven Shall Burn a L'Olympia
programme.desc: Massive guitars, hard-hitting riffs! Heaven Shall Burn are a German melodic death metal band who have been on the scene for over twenty-five years. Its five members distil music that rarely dips below 150 bpm. On stage, singer Marcus Bischoff tears out his vocal cords and turns the Olympia upside down.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Suzanne Lenglen, Le Court De La Liberte
programme.desc: Having won 250 tournaments, including 83 without losing a single game, 3 Olympic medals, 6 Wimbledon titles and only suffered 7 defeats, Suzanne Lenglen (1899-1938) left an indelible mark on world tennis. Away from the court, the French tennis player was also a feminist icon and talented writer.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: a Mon Tour
programme.desc: Life for Felix de Ponte, mayor of Châteauneuf-sur-Valone, was one long success story, until a press article left it in shreds. His little schemes, his mistress: it was all there! Humiliated, his wife Rose decides to get her own back by standing against him in the forthcoming local election.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Les Journees Particulieres by LVMH: perspectives for the craft professions in the world of fashion. The story of sauerkraut, a journey from China to Alsace. Graphic artist Sarah Naud and her sculptures in cement. How to get the biker look. Dgena Mouclier and upcycled menswear fashion.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kakampi Ko ang Diyos
programme.desc: Using a religious stature to defend himself, an ex-soldier and intelligence agent gets trapped in a conspiracy involving government and rebel forces.

programme.title: Encounter ep 21
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 7
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: The Kasambahays S2 ep 19
programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 7
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 12
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 2
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 7
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 2
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Sing Galing Season 3 Ep 24
programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. If the contestant fails to sing the right lyrics and in tune, an animated genie would pop up on the screen and strike an animated gong to signal the end of the unfortunate aspirant's chance at instant wealth and glory.

programme.title: Masked Singer S3 ep 7 Part 1
programme.desc: New Season, new masked singers, exciting twists and triple the fun on the third season of Masked Singer Pilipinas

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 13
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 4
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 10
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.
